target: tato māṁ tattvato jñātvā viśate tad-anantaram

source: iti te jiAanam akhyatam guhyad guhyataram maya
target: iti te jñānam ākhyātaṁ guhyād guhya-taraṁ mayā

source: man-mana bhava mad-bhakto mad-yaji mam namaskuru
target: man-manā bhava mad-bhakto mad-yājī māṁ namaskuru

source: mam evaisyasi satyam te pratijane priyo 'si me
target: mām evaiṣyasi satyaṁ te pratijāne priyo ’si me

source: sarva-dharman parityajya mam ekam saranam vraja
target: sarva-dharmān parityajya mām ekaṁ śaraṇaṁ vraja

source: aham tvam sarva-papebhyo moksayisyami ma sucah
target: ahaṁ tvāṁ sarva-pāpebhyo mokṣayiṣyāmi mā śucaḥ

source: ya idam paramam guhyam mad-bhaktesv abhidhasyati
target: ya idaṁ paramaṁ guhyaṁ mad-bhakteṣv abhidhāsyati

source: bhaktim mayi param krtva mam evaisyaty asamsayah
target: bhaktiṁ mayi parāṁ kṛtvā mām evaiṣyaty asaṁśayaḥ

source: na ca tasman manusyesu kascin me priya-krttamah
target: na ca tasmān manuṣyeṣu kaścin me priya-kṛttamaḥ

source: bhavita na ca me tasmad anyah priyataro bhuvi
target: bhavitā na ca me tasmād anyaḥ priya-taro bhuvi

source: nasto mohah smrtir labdha tvat-prasadan mayacyuta
target: naṣṭo mohaḥ smṛtir labdhā tvat-prasādān mayācyuta

source: yatra yogesvarah krsno yatra partho dhanur-dharah
target: yatra yogeśvaraḥ kṛṣṇo yatra pārtho dhanur-dharaḥ

source: tatra Ssrir vijayo bhutir dhruva nitir matir mama
target: tatra śrīr vijayo bhūtir dhruvā nītir matir mama

source: poratma paramatma ca mukzinim parama gatih
target: pūtātmā paramātmā ca muktānāṁ paramā gatiḥ

source: yaych purussh siket ksetrajfiothsara eva ca
target: avyayaḥ puruṣaḥ sākṣī kṣetrajñōkṣara eva ca

source: iandh prnadah prano fyesthah Sresthsh prajipatih
target: īśānaḥ prāṇadaḥ prāṇō jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ prajāpatiḥ
īśvarō vikramī dhanvī medhāvī vikramaḥ kramaḥ

source: iindrh semgrahch srgo dhrttma niyamo yamch
target: atīndraḥ saṅgrahaḥ sargō dhṛtātmā niyamō yama

source: velyo vaidysh sedaycg1 viraha madhavo madhuh
target: vedyō vaidyaḥ sadāyōgī vīrahā mādhavō madhuḥ

source: amztyuh sarvadrh simhah sandhata sandhiman sthirah
target: amṛtyuḥ sarvadṛk siṁhaḥ sandhātā sandhimān sthiraḥ

source: cubhujo durdharo vigmt makendro vasudo vasuh
target: subhujō durdharō vāgmī mahendrō vasudō vasuḥ

source: stavyah stava-priyah stotrath stutah stota rapa-priyah
target: stavyaḥ stavapriyaḥ stōtraṁ stutiḥ stōtā raṇapriyaḥ
kāmahā kāmakṛt kāntaḥ kāmaḥ kāmapradaḥ prabhuḥ

source: karagam karagam karta vikarta grhano guhah
target: karaṇaṁ kāraṇaṁ kartā vikartā gahanō guhaḥ
rāmō virāmō virajō mārgō neyō nayōnayaḥ

source: vailunthah purusah prinah pranadah peanavah prthuh
target: vaikuṇṭhaḥ puruṣaḥ prāṇaḥ prāṇadaḥ praṇavaḥ pṛthuḥ

source: yrjlla ijyo makefysica keatub satram setim gatlh
target: yajña ijyō mahejyaśca kratuḥ satraṁ satāṁ gatiḥ
suvrataḥ sumukhaḥ sūkṣmaḥ sughōṣaḥ sukhadaḥ suhṛt

source: vinayo jaysh sstyasandho dafirhah sitvatam patih
